alert.note: Alert for Coastal Ocean; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 10 at 11:44AM EST until January 10 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Up to two feet of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Ocean County New Jersey. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure will be inundated. Some shoreline erosion will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While no additional flooding is expected on the ocean front, flooding is expected to linger into this evening on back bays, especially Barnegat Bay.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
